content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jukebox
inventory=[{"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: I need to craft acacia_planks before I can craft a jukebox. I have an item of type stripped_acacia_wood at slot 45. This item can be used to craft acacia_planks by placing it in the crafting grid. Therefore I will move the stripped_acacia_wood to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jukebox
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_crimson_stem", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: The acacia_planks have been crafted in slot 0, so I will now move them into my inventory at slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jukebox
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a jukebox, I need to place 8 planks of any type in a U-shape around a diamond. First, I will move one crimson plank from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jukebox
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "crimson_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 11}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "lava_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "chainmail_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 16, "index": 34}, {"type": "leather_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "stripped_acacia_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 42}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 43}]
thought: Next, I will move another crimson plank from slot 11 to slot 2, which is above slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1
